text: Saleha balalena-he amara jati! Tomara ki mane kara, ami yadi amara palanakartara paksa hate bud'dhi bibecana labha kare thaki ara tini yadi amake nijera tarapha hate rahamata dana kare thakena, atahpara ami yadi tamra abadhya ha'i tabe tara theke ke amaya raksa karabe? Tomara to amara ksati chara kichu'i brd'dhi karate parabe na
